Enhanced Content Query Webpart

This Enhanced Content Query Webpart for SharePoint 2010 is meant for the advanced application developer. You will be able to create any rollup of pages of any Content Type(s), Site Column(s) from any subsite(s) with (any) style you want. Xslt skills are required.

Features

  • Add any (sub)Site(s) all over the SiteCollection
  • Query any Content Type(s)
  • Add any Column(s) in no time
  • Change style to any Layout without deploying anything

This is a sort-by-year webpart, when you click on the year, only the items of that year expand. If you add the jQuery library to your SharePoint masterpage, you can even limit the total expanded items.
